mapper.sql: id, car_sale_info_id, old_pay_money, new_pay_money, difference, mod_reason, ctime, utime
mapper.insert: insert into cm_car_pay_money_assist (car_sale_info_id, old_pay_money, new_pay_money, difference, mod_reason, ctime, utime) values (#{carSaleInfoId},#{oldPayMoney},#{newPayMoney},#{difference},#{modReason},#{ctime},#{utime})
mapper.delete:
delete from cm_car_pay_money_assist where 1=1
and car_sale_info_id = #{linkId}
mapper.update:
update cm_car_pay_money_assist
car_sale_info_id = #{carSaleInfoId},
old_pay_money = #{oldPayMoney},
new_pay_money = #{newPayMoney},
difference = #{difference},
mod_reason = #{modReason},
utime = #{utime},
where id = #{id}
